title: Arcanea Oracles Proto Codex
subtitle: Foresight rituals for benevolent world building

preface.invocation: Foresight is stewardship. Use these practices to listen, decide, and course-correct with care.
body: This proto codex turns signals into action. It keeps Arcanea realms aligned with human-positive futures by pairing data, community insight, and Guardian counsel.
Customize the rituals for your world. Share your learnings into Starlight so every realm benefits.
preface.oath: We publish only what we can defend, we act with transparency, and we invite our communities into the conversation.

chapters.title: Chapter I – Signal Looms
chapters.tagline: Capture the right data, not all data

epigraph.text: A well-tended loom shows you the future you are actually creating.

introduction: Signal looms combine qualitative stories and quantitative metrics. They respect consent and context.

sections.heading: Loom Setup
body: Select 6–8 signal sources that represent behavior, sentiment, economics, and lore health.
Document provenance, update cadence, and guardians responsible.
principles: Never add a source without consent.

sections.heading: Interpretation
body: Pair Guardians with human analysts to craft weekly summaries.
Flag anomalies and celebrate expected wins.

artifacts.name: Signal Digest
artifacts.description: One-page brief for councils and investors.

measurements.name: Signal Trust Index
measurements.description: Count of signals with verified provenance and owner.

chapters.title: Chapter II – Temporal Notebooks

epigraph.text: Planning is only useful when someone owns the next move.

introduction: Temporal notebooks document plausible futures, emotional tone, and the interventions you are willing to make.

sections.heading: Scenario Cards
body: Write title, description, probabilities, opportunity, risk.
Link to signals that sparked the scenario.

insights.title: Emotional Tone
insights.detail: Log how each future will feel to your community.

sections.heading: Intervention Ledger
body: List actions, owners, deadlines, status.
Update after every council.
principles: No scenario without a response option.
Archive outdated futures with a note on why they shifted.

measurements.name: Response Velocity
measurements.description: Average time from scenario identification to action.

chapters.title: Chapter III – Steward Panels

epigraph.text: Decisions feel better when everyone can see why they happened.

introduction: Steward panels review foresight, approve interventions, and log the reasoning into Starlight.

sections.heading: Panel Design
body: Include builders, community voices, external advisors, Guardians.
Publish charter, cadence, and decision rights.

artifacts.name: Panel Charter
artifacts.description: Document outlining purpose, membership, transparency rules.

sections.heading: Decision Journals
body: For every major call, log signals, options considered, decision, owner, review date.

measurements.name: Decision Transparency
measurements.description: Percent of major calls logged within 48 hours.

chapters.title: Chapter IV – Starlight Practices

epigraph.text: Starlight is the memory that keeps our intelligence benevolent.

introduction: Capture daily notes and transmissions. Let Guardians review and sync them to vaults across cloud + web3.

sections.heading: Daily Notes
body: Log insights, breakthroughs, ethical dilemmas, thank-yous.
Attach tags: realm, topic, emotion, follow-up.

sections.heading: Transmissions
body: Lumina messages, Guardian summaries, community letters.
Publish curated transmissions monthly.

artifacts.name: Starlight Digest
artifacts.description: Monthly highlight reel for teams and partners.

measurements.name: Vault Freshness
measurements.description: Days since last note or transmission.

entries.heading: Weekly Ritual
body: Signal digest
Scenario review
Action updates
Community pulse

entries.heading: Guardians
body: Lyrix (signals)
Veya (scenarios)
Elara (community)
Nexus (ops)

glossary.definition: Curated set of quantitative + qualitative data points.
Living document of plausible futures and responses.
